relationships.relationship_type: does not want to talk to
relationships.description: Harry does not want to have a conversation with Luna Lovegood.
Hermione is trying to convince Harry to check if Sirius is at home before going to London.
Ron looks at Harry when Hermione says they can help.
Hermione is trying to convince Harry that they need to save Sirius.
Harry is trying to save Sirius and check if he is at home before going to London.
Hermione swears that she will not try to stop Harry from saving Sirius if they find out that he is not at home.
